desc: This course provides a comprehensive research opportunity, including an introduction to relevant background material, technical instruction, identification of a meaningful project, and data collection. The topic is determined by the faculty member in charge of the course and may relate to his/her research interests. Offered based on department decision. May be offered as a 1.00 credit course or .50 credit course. Prerequisite: determined by individual instructor.
name: Res: Adv Screenwriting
notes: Prerequisites: completion of English 296 Screenwriting and permission of the instructor.
title: Directed Undergraduate Research: "Topic Description"
